publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2380 Stuart McMillan: Police Make Second Largest Drugs Seizure Ever in Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates Strathclyde Police on making the second largest drugs seizure ever in Scotland by recovering cannabis with a reported street value of £1.2 million in Inverclyde; notes that the police estimated that 1,000 plants were being grown but, since the equipment has been dismantled, four times that amount has been recovered; further notes this haul will dent the illegal drugs industry in the short-term, and commends Strathclyde Police for its dedication to removing drugs from our streets and communities.

S3M-2380 Police Make Second Largest Drugs Seizure Ever in Scotland (lodged on 8 August 2008) Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Jamie McGrigor*, Rob Gibson*, John Lamont*, Bashir Ahmad*, Bob Doris*, Gil Paterson*, Jim Tolson*
S3M-2380Police Make Second Largest Drugs Seizure Ever in Scotland (lodged on 8 August 2008) Michael Matheson*
